ai-tha-ap86:1.1_0: “Those name is the monk named Abhibhū.
ai-tha-ap86:1.3_0: With great power and the three knowledges,
ai-tha-ap86:2.1_0: I too am the slander of the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap86:2.4_0: along with the three psychic powers.
ai-tha-ap86:3.2_0: I’ll make a wish to live on the mountain,
ai-tha-ap86:4.4_0: went away from Pāvā to see her.
ai-tha-ap86:6.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap86:7.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap86:7.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap86:7.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.
ai-tha-ap86:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Unalā.
